entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:49 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Barrhead 1:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:48 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 12:48 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:48 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 12:48 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
